com.communote.server.core.user.security

Interface PasswordHashFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BcryptPasswordHashFunction, Md5PasswordHashFunction

    public interface PasswordHashFunction
    Author:
    Communote Team - https://github.com/Communote

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canHandle(String passwordHash)
      Test whether the provided hash was generated by generate(String) of this hash function.
      boolean check(String passwordHash, String password)
      Test a clear text password against a password hash generated by this hash function.
      String generate(String password)
      Generate the hash of a clear text password.
      String getIdentifier() 
      boolean needsUpdate(String passwordHash)
      Test whether a password hash needs to be updated.

    • Method Detail

      • canHandle

        boolean canHandle(String passwordHash)
        Test whether the provided hash was generated by generate(String) of this hash function.
        Parameters:
        passwordHash - a password hash
        Returns:
        true if the hash was generated by this function, false otherwise

      • check

        boolean check(String passwordHash,
              String password)
        Test a clear text password against a password hash generated by this hash function. This method will only be called if canHandle(String) for the hash returns true.
        Parameters:
        passwordHash - a hash generated by this function
        password - the clear text password to validate
        Returns:
        true if the hash was created from the given password, false otherwise

      • generate

        String generate(String password)
        Generate the hash of a clear text password. The resulting string has to contain information to determine whether the hash was generated by this function (canHandle(String)) and to check the hash against a clear-text password in check(String, String). The latter requires to include the salt and any parameters like cost factors or iterations in the created string. A recommended way to encode this information is the PHC string format.
        Parameters:
        password - the clear text password to hash
        Returns:
        the generated hash with all relevant information

      • getIdentifier

        String getIdentifier()
        Returns:
        a unique identifier of the hash function (key derivation function) or function family.

      • needsUpdate

        boolean needsUpdate(String passwordHash)
        Test whether a password hash needs to be updated. If the function for instance has a configurable cost factor this method could check whether the cost factor used to generate the hash is up-to-date and return false if not. In case false is returned a new hash will be generated with a call to generate(String). This method will only be called if canHandle(String) for the hash returns true.
        Parameters:
        passwordHash - a hash generated by this function
        Returns:
        true if the hash should be updated to adhere to newer/stronger security requirements
